    • Method Detail

      • listBluetoothAdaptorsWithInfo

        public SerialComBluetoothAdapter[] listBluetoothAdaptorsWithInfo()
                                                          throws SerialComException

        Returns an array containing information about all the Bluetooth adaptors present in the system found by this library.

        Returns:
        list of the local Bluetooth adaptor(s) with information about them or empty array if no adaptor found.
        Throws:
        SerialComException - if an I/O error occurs.
